column2: @man_monster3 In an alternate world UFA's monsters competed with Universal's. Imagine Caesar  Golem  and Nosferatu in 'House of Caligari'
This grotesque golem has outdone even its usual inhumanity with this one #VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare https://t.co/zlYxSfqfcJ
@kate_germano Isn't that the Golem Effect in action?
